components.description: A component for displaying a multi-heading banner that is responsive
components.examples:
```jsx
 const data = {
  "headerText1": "Black Friday",
  "backgroundColor": "#000",
  "headerColor1": "#9ed6fa",
  "headerText3": null,
  "headerText2": "Deals",
  "headerColor3": "#222",
  "headerColor2": "#f47421",
  "secondaryText1": "Your hottest offers for today.",
  "secondaryColor1": "#fff",
  "secondaryText2": null,
  "secondaryColor2": "#f47421",
  "secondaryText3": null,
  "secondaryColor3": "#222"
};
 React.render(<Banner {...data} />, mountNode);
 ```

tabsToLoad.description:
Number of tabs to load. This will be used to lazily load the tabs into dom
  only when tabs are switched. Currently we just render the active tab.
  So onchanging the tabs, there is always going to dom modifications.

buttonOpenText.description: Revealer button text when revealer is closed

large.description: Number of tiles per row at large breakpoints

medium.description: Number of tiles per row at medium breakpoints

rows.description: Number of rows that are visible when the revealer is closed

small.description: Number of tiles per row at small breakpoints

xLarge.description: Number of tiles per row at x-large breakpoints

components.description:
A component for displaying a group of tiles within a sliding drawer container.

The child Revealer component requires a base height be input; the base height
determines the height of the container when the component is collapsed. The base
height is dynamically calculated, after the component has mounted, using the
height of the tiles, the overall height of the container, and the number of rows
that should be displayed.

This component is responsive. The height of container will be recalculated on a
screen resize. To minimize the effects of many screen resizings, this method is
wrapped in lodash's debounce function.

onChange.description:
callback when chooser value is changed or any button is clicked in
  case of button group.

options.description: options to be rendered as chooser or as in individual buttons

components.description:
Tab Navigation component. It will act as navigation for Tabbed content.
It is capable of rendering based on device width.
It renders a Chooser component for smaller breakpoints and Button groups
for higher breakpoints

playground.title: TabNavigation
playground.code:

 options={[ " Tab1", "Tab2"]}
 value={1}
/>

moduleType.description: Tempo module type for analytics and automation testing

onChange.description: Callback for tab changes. Redux dispatch callback.

title.name: string
title.description: Tab Title: Will be displayed as Chooser option or Button text

tabs.description: Tabs to display: Tab title and product data

tabsToLoad.description:
Number of tabs to load. This will be used to lazily load the tabs into dom
  only when tabs are switched. Currently we just render the active tab.
  So onchanging the tabs, there is always going to dom modifications.

components.description:
Tabbed Product carousel
Content pane will be Product Carousel and navigation will depend on device width.
For mobile breakpoints, it will render a Chooser component.
For desktop breakpoints, it will be normal group of badge buttons

playground.title: TabbedProductCarousel
playground.code:

methods.name: _renderButton
_renderOverlayLink
methods.description: Renders the overlay link for the tile.

imageUrl.description: Background image source for the tile.

moduleType.description: Tempo module type for analytics and automation testing

button.description: Theme Button with custom background and text color

components.description: Themed tile Component to be used along with product tiles in product carousels
components.examples:
```jsx
<ThemedTile
  url: "//www.walmart.com",
  imageUrl: "//some-background-image.png"
/>

<ThemedTile
  url: "//www.walamrt.com",
  imageUrl: "//some-background-image.png",
  button: {
    textColor: "#f2f2f2",
    color: "#333",
    text: "Shop Now"
  }
/>
```

playground.title: ThemedTile
playground.code:
<ThemedTile
  url="//www.walamrt.com"
  imageUrl="//some-background-image.png"
/>

<ThemedTile
  url="//www.walmart.com"
  imageUrl="//some-background-image.png"
  button={{
    textColor: "#f2f2f2",
    bolor: "#333",
    text: "Shop Now"
  }}
/>

maxTiles.description: Maximum number of tiles displayed in the open revealer

large.description: Number of top brand tiles per row at large breakpoints

medium.description: Number of top brand tiles per row at medium breakpoints

moduleType.description: Tempo module type for analytics and automation testing

rows.description: Number of rows that are visible when the revealer is closed

small.description: Number of top brand tiles per row at small breakpoints

xLarge.description: Number of top brand tiles per row at x-large breakpoints

xSmall.description: Number of top brand tiles per row at x-small breakpoints
